document.docAuthor: Mantelatto, Fernando L., Tamburus, Ana Francisca, Magalhães, Tatiana, Buranelli, Raquel C., Terossi, Mariana, Negri, Mariana, Castilho, Antonio L., Costa, Rogério C. & Zara, Fernando J.
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of decapod crustaceans from the coast of the São Paulo state (Brazil) supported by integrative molecular and morphological data: III. Infraorder Brachyura Latreille, 1802

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of decapod crustaceans from the coast of the São Paulo state (Brazil) supported by integrative molecular and morphological data: III. Infraorder Brachyura Latreille, 1802

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
Brazil , São Paulo : 1 ♂ , CCDB 5296 , Ubatuba , Rio Escuro mangrove, colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
22.iv.2012
;
6 ♂ , 4 ♀ , CCDB 5301 , Ubatuba , Rio Escuro mangrove, colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
22.iv.2014
;
22 ♂ , 14 ♀ , CCDB 4060 , Ubatuba , Rio Escuro mangrove, colls. R . Buranelli et al. ,
23.iv.2012
;
9 ♂ , 5 ♀ , CCDB 4999 , Bertioga , Rio Itapanhau mangrove, colls. R . Buranelli & L. Cerantola ,
13.iv.2014
;
1 ♀ , CCDB 4038 , Guarujá , Bairro Cachoeira , colls. N. Rossi et al. ,
24.x.2011
;
4 ♂ , CCDB 3207 , Ilha Comprida , Rio Praia Boqueirão Preto , colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
18.iv.2011
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 4233 , Ilha Comprida , Rio Praia Boqueirão Preto , colls. R . Costa et al. ,
17.iv.2011
;
3 ♂ , CCDB 4042 , Ilha Comprida , beach near ferry station to Cananéia , colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
11.iii.2012
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 5682 , Ilha Comprida , beach near ferry station to Cananéia , colls. F. Mantelatto et al. ,
22.vii.2012
;
1 ♂ , CCDB 4055 , Cananéia , Cantagalo estuary, colls. R . Costa et al. ,
21.v.2012
;
5 ♂ , CCDB 739 , Cananéia , estuary, colls. R . Costa et al. ,
30.viii.2011
;
1 ♂ , 1 ♀ , CCDB 3479 , Cananéia , Rio Bragança estuary, colls. R . Costa et al. ,
17.iv.2011
.

Remarks. Previous records on the coast of São Paulo include Cananéia ( Gerlach 1958 ), Ubatuba, and Cubatão ( Bezerra 2012 ). The species is morphologically close to its congeners
M. burgersi
and
M. mordax (
Masunari et al . 2020
)
. Sequences accession number (GenBank): CCDB 4042—16S ( MF490221 ), COI ( MF490125 ) (
Mantelatto et al. 2018a
).
